call_title: Ergo Dev Update Feb 9th 2025 |  SigmaUSD, Ledger, Minotaur, Nautilus, Rosen, ergfi, and more!

topics.title: SigmaUSD Bank Update and Price Arbitrage
topics.summary: Discussion of SigmaUSD bank testing by Unreal and explanation of arbitrage opportunities between DEX prices and bank prices. Detailed walkthrough of proxy contracts vs direct bank interaction methods.

topics.title: Nautilus Wallet Ledger Integration Updates
topics.summary: Anand Bihar released Nautilus v0.2.0 with Ergo Ledger JS improvements including device management methods and UI fixes. Refactored transaction signing and address confirmation components.

topics.title: ErgFi Dexy Gold Integration Progress
topics.summary: C8 reports Dexy Gold integration ETA in a few weeks with completed LP actions and bank operations. UI integration and ErgoPay features are in progress along with mempool server integration.

topics.title: Sub-blocks Development and Spring of Code
topics.summary: Kushti's progress on sub-blocks with DAG representation and API methods completed. Discussion of replacing ErgoHack with a spring/summer of code focused on preparing dApps for sub-blocks implementation.

topics.title: Node Version 6.0.0 RC and Testnet Voting
topics.summary: Version 6.0.0 RC released with testnet voting support and activation voting starting soon in next 120 block epoch. Testnet is running with UI testing for SigmaUSD updates.

topics.title: Paideia DAO Platform Debugging
topics.summary: Luivatra worked with CannonQ to debug DAO creation issues. QX() praises Paideia as excellent tool for group decision-making with funds management capabilities.

topics.title: Minotaur Wallet Feature Updates
topics.summary: Voryu Jack added address book selection, wallet archiving, and favorites display features. QX() demonstrates cold wallet setup using Android device with Minotaur for offline transaction signing.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Architecture and Bitcoin Integration
topics.summary: Major Rosen Bridge updates including network structure improvements and watcher v2 development. Bitcoin runes R&D completed with implementation phase starting despite API rate limit concerns.

topics.title: Fanta's Index Node Frontend Development
topics.summary: Fanta created new frontend for index nodes offering easier setup compared to full Ergo Explorer. This provides simpler alternative for users wanting self-hosted blockchain exploration tools.

topics.title: Cornell BRICK Token Distribution Update
topics.summary: Cornell BRICK token pilot progressing with 30 wallets distributed to architecture students out of 800 total. Several students have successfully redeemed free prints using the token system.
